taskbody.context: A pageflow file cannot exist outside of a package. The following steps assume that you have an existing Design Studio Workbench package. There is no limit to the number of pageflow files you can create in a package.

step.cmd: In the DS Navigator view pane, click on the package in which you want to create a new pageflow file.
Right-click on the project folder name, and select New Pageflow.

stepresult.p: The Create Pageflow dialogue box is displayed.

step.cmd: In the Pageflow Name field, type the name of the new pageflow file.
(Optional) In the Description field, type a description of the pageflow file.

stepresult.p: The name of the new pageflow file is displayed in the DS Navigator view pane in the appropriate package.

step.cmd: In the Properties view pane that is located below the Editor area, complete all fields (mandatory fields are indicated with an asterisk). For more information about how to complete this view pane, see section " Page flow properties ".
